person.content:

Paragraph: During his keynote speech, Elon Musk, the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, announced the successful launch of the Falcon Heavy rocket. Musk also discussed his plans for colonizing Mars in the future.

In this paragraph, the person entities are:

2. The CEO of SpaceX and Tesla (although this is a title and role, it's directly related to the person Elon Musk)

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Millet unq unq 90 unq

Let's think step by step.

I'm sorry for the confusion, but the paragraph you provided does not contain any discernible locations or "Location" entities. It seems to be a collection of nonsensical words or abbreviations. Could you please provide a different paragraph that contains actual locations so I can assist you better?
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Paragraph: John is visiting from New York and plans to see the Statue of Liberty today. He will then head to Times Square to meet his friends for dinner. Later, they will go to the Metropolitan Museum of Art to enjoy the art exhibits.

Revised Paragraph: John is visiting from [New York](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York) and plans to see the [Statue of Liberty](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Statue_of_Liberty) today. He will then head to [Times Square](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Times_Square) to meet his friends for dinner. Later, they will go to the [Metropolitan Museum of Art](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metropolitan_Museum_of_Art) to enjoy the art exhibits.

Location Entities:

1. New York
2. Statue of Liberty
3. Times Square
4. Metropolitan Museum of Art

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location     |
|--------------|
| New York     |
| Statue of Liberty |
| Times Square  |
| Metropolitan Museum of Art |
